name: Bronze Sable
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sable remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sable has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sable's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the sable surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sable makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
